BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the disclosure of service fee charges associated with tickets to entertainment events in New York city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Disclosure of service fee charges associated with tickets to entertainment events in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring nightlife establishments to post signage informing patrons about harassment and to train employees about harassment among patrons
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring nightlife establishments to post signage informing patrons about harassment and to train employees about harassment among patrons.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the charter of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Office of Nightlife to post information on its website for nightlife establishments, including resources and trainings about harassment among patrons
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Office of Nightlife to post information on its website for nightlife establishments, including resources and trainings about harassment among patrons.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, Office of Public Safety to update its mandatory security guard training curriculum to include sexual harassment prevention and bystander intervention training for all security guards who work in nightlife establishments.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services, Office of Public Safety to update its mandatory security guard training curriculum to include sexual harassment prevention and bystander intervention training for all security guards who work in nightlife establi
